rows.label: qst201707_msg0001
rows.name:
Um...
Hey, everybody... Could you wait
up just a moment?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0002
rows.name:
What's wrong?
Your face is a strange color.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0003
rows.name:
Did Newt eat something bad? Worms
from ground look tasty but they not.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0004
rows.name:
N-no, I didn't do anything like that!
Don't assume everyone is like you!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0005
rows.name: So what's up?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0006
rows.name:
I know that meeting the Emperor
is, like, a huge deal.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0007
rows.name:
But I'm feeling all this pressure
to not screw it up even a little bit.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0008
rows.name: Nervous, are we?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0009
rows.name:
You know, Newt, even you
can be adorable sometimes.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0010
rows.name: A-adorable?!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0011
rows.name:
What's that supposed to mean?
Quit making fun of me!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0012
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph!
Excuse me!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0013
rows.name:
A messenger.
What news?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0014
rows.name:
His Majesty the Emperor is
busy with training.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0015
rows.name:
He begs your forgiveness but your
audience is canceled.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0017
rows.name:
So you're saying we don't
get to meet the Emperor?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0018
rows.name:
That's right.
Maybe some other day.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0019
rows.name:
Oh. Well, that's a shame...
I'm pretty disappointed.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0020
rows.name: Excuse me - are you Newt?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0021
rows.name: Who, me? Yes, so what?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0022
rows.name: I thought so!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0023
rows.name:
Word of your military prowess
has reached Hadashal Palace.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0024
rows.name:
Could I perhaps trouble you for
a handshake? Don't break my hand!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0025
rows.name:
A handshake?
Sure thing, I guess...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0026
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0027
rows.name:
I can't believe I shook the hand of
the famous Newt!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0028
rows.name: Ho there, do I get a handshake?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0029
rows.name: Me too!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0030
rows.name:
I've heard all about you! They say
you're the strongest Blade there is!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0031
rows.name: The whole army's in awe of you!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0032
rows.name:
R-really?
The...whole army?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0033
rows.name:
Ahh you're gonna make me blush!
Ahahaha!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0034
rows.name: Form an orderly queue for handshakes!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0035
rows.name:
So, um...
If you like, Newt, you could join
us on our training exercises.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0036
rows.name: You'd want me to join you?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0037
rows.name:
Yes! Morale would shoot through the
roof if everyone heard you were
taking part!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0038
rows.name: But, um, I'm just a Blade, you know...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0039
rows.name: That's no reason to refuse.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0040
rows.name:
I reckon it would be good practice
for all of us. Why don't we all do it?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0041
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0042
rows.name: All right then! I'll set things up.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0043
rows.name:
Go talk to Navarre in the Nharil Central
Plaza and he'll give you the lowdown.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0044
rows.name: Got it!
